comments:

A fresh eclipse install with WTP installed from the update site:
eclipse 3.1.1
wtp 1.0
emf 2.1.1
gef 3.1.1
This should be working in WTP 1.0.1.  1.0.1 also has a significant amount of defect fixes over 1.0.  I would suggest moving to the latest declared 101 build.
